Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:55:57
Folder: CZL49Q8 - end of year holidays, time to reflect & complete your self-assessment, fashion & beauty
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CZL49Q8_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-18 16:15
Subject: End of Year Holidays, Time to Reflect & Complete Your Self-Assessment, Fashion & Beauty Trends Masterclass, Dubai Run, AI Central on Chalhoub University, Talents Beyond the Workplace, The Podcast & Skincare Assessment Center in Egypt
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/550614/7D6BE4E1B8CF8BE918135DF99F2AB388/end-of-year-2024uae-1.png> 	
Take some well-deserved time off this end-of-year holiday season! Use this break to recharge, focus on your wellbeing, and enjoy quality time with loved ones.

Holiday Schedule:
- UAE National Day: Our offices will be closed on December 2nd and 3rd, 2024. We will reopen on December 4th, 2024.

- Christmas: Our offices will be closed on December 24th (half-day) and December 25th, 2024. We will reopen on December 26th, 2024.

- New Year’s: Our offices will be closed on December 31st (half-day) and January 1st, 2025. We will reopen on January 2nd, 2025.

chunks.text:
- Christmas: Our offices will be closed on December 24th (half-day) and December 25th, 2024. We will reopen on December 26th, 2024.

- New Year’s: Our offices will be closed on December 31st (half-day) and January 1st, 2025. We will reopen on January 2nd, 2025.

Store Consultants and Distribution Center team members will follow the timings of their respective malls, stores, and work locations.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/544551/AAEE71058637B68C291CCE98C206DDCF/nuggets-06.png> 	

IT’S TIME TO REFLECT AND COMPLETE YOUR SELF-ASSESSMENT  

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/550634/140DE328A117AC9A6956FBC999C88818/image-2024-11-18t142836-138.jpeg> 	
Self-assessment is an important step in reflecting on your achievements, challenges, and contributions, ensuring your efforts are visible and recognized. This year, we launched the 360-review functionality, an additional tool that helps you incorporate valuable feedback into your self-assessment.  

Explore various resources here to help guide you through the year-end process. 

Log in to DRIVE to get started and let your work shine! 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

FASHION AND BEAUTY TRENDS MASTERCLASS

Chalhoub University launch AI Central <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fcourse%252fview.php%253fid%253d3339%2526stoploop%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWaRQDG5cDFCxz8UC1Fzr3mItrcNKjnNCbXBY%252fgwz%252b3I5TpwpBIlVXUuqtTpIhuqWgFdmEk6qapV3d%252bToTmnMoc7YxvQcId1wv0Xf3dagy%252bNvnd03W6LlMNna6JdxWK6ATKNyyxR%252bNPJOM5LAw%252b9RF0os6UWdYaNURpIY%252f04P%252bGZMRUkSY%252bVnZs8urr61Bj5dE%252blnPRcoSSuy4oncdV5z%252fYW3ykXZakXsGrEFO89Bpjof&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc931ca255f1a44faf11b08dd07ca9ef0%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638675289029821138%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2FMAEUCyEytM1xs93Jc7UzFs9cb7ogzWWxb1PiPbptfA%3D&reserved=0>  — the ultimate hub for AI learning and innovation. 

AI Central offers easy access to a range of learning resources, starting with the Generative AI for Everyone e-learning. This e-Learning provides an in-depth understanding of Generative AI, its real-world applications, and its potential to transform day-to-day work. 

Complete your learning and challenge a colleague to unlock even more of AI's potential together! #GenAIChallenge

chunks.text:
AI Central offers easy access to a range of learning resources, starting with the Generative AI for Everyone e-learning. This e-Learning provides an in-depth understanding of Generative AI, its real-world applications, and its potential to transform day-to-day work. 

Complete your learning and challenge a colleague to unlock even more of AI's potential together! #GenAIChallenge

Join us on this exciting journey and discover the power of AI and explore our AI Toolbox where you can learn about and recommend Gen AI tools.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/545526/AE0D1AEDA3479DE654F5D4977A5B0D71/nuggets-24.png> 	

TALENTS BEYOND THE WORKPLACE

Congratulations to Jonathan Daukes, Senior Manager - Data Products, who recently showcased his talent and dedication at the 2024 World Masters Hockey World Cup! 

Join us in celebrating Jonathan's remarkable achievement!

OUR LATEST EPISODE OF THE PODCAST

In our ever-changing and uncertain world, Marisa Peer is here to tell us and show us how we create our own certainty; in a new episode, where Lynn Al Khatib, hosts Marisa Peer, the world-renowned therapist and best-selling author, to talk about the importance of emotional intelligence and controlling your mindset. Watch now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fyoutu.be%252fm1pJCNx0Rko%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWaRQDG5cDFCxz8UC1Fzr3mItrcNKjnNCbXBY%252fgwz%252b3I5TpwpBIlVXUuqtTpIhuqWgFdmEk6qapV3d%252bToTmnMoc7YxvQcId1wv0Xf3dagy%252bNvnd03W6LlMNna6JdxWK6ATKNyyxR%252bNPJOM5LAw%252b9RF0os6UWdYaNURpIY%252f04P%252bGZMRUkSY%252bVnZs8urr61Bj5dE%252blnPRcoSSuy4oncdV5z%252fYW3ykXZakXsGrEFO89Bpjof&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc931ca255f1a44faf11b08dd07ca9ef0%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638675289029866024%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=1XD0UhX9G2MUhPck%2F%2F8%2Fuf1lRMZ0QWpRLx28FEXYZFo%3D&reserved=0>

YVES ROCHER SKINCARE ASSESSMENT CENTER IN EGYPT

The first-ever skincare assessment center in Egypt for Yves Rocher! 

The engaging event presented the Group's skincare priority to the candidates and they got to showcase their technical skills through various activities.

 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SbMCnT84Y0qlnMUBQlV-NQ/550640/D0D3F41B64245ECDC8B1E7341BCAC7F0/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-54.gif>
